item.description:
For our Wednesday night fly-out how do you feel about flying into Hartford (HFD) for some Mexican to celebrate Cinco de Mayo? Ok one day late.

I have arranged for a crew car or a line person to transport us to and from a restaurant called Margaritas, a short distance off of the field that I have been told has great food. We could meet at FIT and fly out as a group down to Hartford wheels up at 5:30.
The Airport is very nice and the people at Atlantic Aviation are very friendly and more than willing to help us.

Our flight to Marshfield last Wednesday was a lot of fun. We had a large group of 18 with a total of seven planes. Very nice scenic trip had by all. Flying has been great... If you want to come usually plenty of room. Please RSVP so that I can let the restaurant know how many to expect for dinner. Remember to keep your Wednesday nights free...thats Fly-out night!

By the way, if anyone has a place that they would like to go, please let one of your orginizers know. We will be more than happy to add it. Always looking for fun destinations!!



http://www.airnav.com...

http://www.margs.com/...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Cinco de Mayo at Margaritas, Hartford, CT
